org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.things

Class VeluxProductSerialNo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.things.VeluxProductSerialNo

  • @NonNullByDefault
public final class VeluxProductSerialNo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class support handling of Serial Number used with Velux.
    • UNKNOWN defines an unknown serial number as constant,
    • toString(byte[], java.lang.String) converts the serial number as array of bytes into a human-readable String,
    • isInvalid(byte[]) evaluates whether the given serial number is valid,
    • indicatesRevertedValues(java.lang.String) returns a flag whether the serial number indicates inversion,
    • cleaned(java.lang.String) returns a plain serial number without any inverse indicators.

    Example:

    • 12:23:34:45:56:67:78:89 represents a normal serial number,
    • 12:23:34:45:56:67:78:89* represents a serial number which leads to an inverted value handling.
    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution
